Steps.Message: Update at 18:39 - It's going to take us a little longer than we expected to get all the power back on in the area. Our engineers have came across a damaged water pipe and will need the water board to attend to repair it. Therefore, we're now aiming to restore supplies between 21:00 and 22:00 provided they can repair the leak. We're sorry we've had to change the estimated time, but we'll keep you updated.

We became aware of a power cut at 15:16. We’re sorry for any disruption this may have caused you. We didn’t know in advance there would be a power cut but now that we know, our teams will do everything they can to get your power back quickly.
Steps.Name: Power cut reported

Steps.Message: We have engineers on their way. As this is affecting your area, they will not need to attend your property. Rest assured once they arrive, they’ll work as quickly as is safely possible to get your power back on.
Steps.Name: Engineers on their way

Steps.Message: Engineers are now on site, carrying out investigations into the fault. Once they have completed their assessment, they will carry out repairs.
Steps.Name: Engineers investigating and fixing

Logs.Comment: Update at 18:39 - It's going to take us a little longer than we expected to get all the power back on in the area. Our engineers have came across a damaged water pipe and will need the water board to attend to repair it. Therefore, we're now aiming to restore supplies between 21:00 and 22:00 provided they can repair the leak. We're sorry we've had to change the estimated time, but we'll keep you updated.

IncidentCategoryCustomerFriendlyDescript: A fault occurred on an underground electricity cable affecting the local area.
